name: M - Visit Carlos
_source: speak;Carlos; Maybe I can sneak out the window before she-
speak;Kate; You thought barricading the door could keep me out?!
speak;Carlos; No, no, no, the barricade was for the monsters, I swear.
speak;Kate; How about we talk about how you let my little sister onto the battlefield?{w} The one I told you <bconvo>not</> to let her onto?
speak;Carlos; Well, you see, she was so eager to get out there,{w} and who was I to crush a little girl's dreams like that-
speak;Kate; If I had half a mind, I would throw you out into the harbor for that choice.{w} This is the last time I ever leave you in charge.
speak;Carlos; You say that, but you know you need me.{w} I'm your tactician for a reason.{w} And we're such close friends, right?
speak;Kate; Yeah, you're right{tgm}...{tgm}I do need you.{w} So get your armored ass out of the house and onto the battlefield.{w} If the little girl can do it, so can you.
speak;Carlos; Your flesh shows no sign of putrefaction.{w} It seems you're not a revenant.
speak;Luna; D-Did you think I w-wouldn't make it?
speak;Carlos; Of course I knew you could do it.{w} I gotta tease you once in a while.{w} Anyway, I'm ready to fight.{w} Let's kill some demons!
speak;Emma; You're{tgm}...{tgm} You're Carlos, right?{w} I didn't enter the wrong house?
speak;Carlos; Your flesh shows no sign of putrefaction.{w} It seems you're not a revenant.
speak;Emma; No, I'm not. Again, are you Carlos? Kate said-

speak;Carlos; Why didn't you <bconvo>start</> with that?{w} Come, I insist you follow me into combat.{w} I am a knight of superior wisdom and extraordinary ability.{w} I've been reading up on these revenants,{w} and they are, quite simply, no match for me.{w} I am superior, after all.
speak;Emma; What an odd guy{tgm}...{tgm}{w} He's confident, if nothing else.{w} Yeah, that's the right word{tgm}...
speak;{unit}; Carlos? Kate said you were in here.
speak;Carlos; Hm? ah, our friends, The Defiants.{w} It's nice to see you again.{w} Just a shame it's under the worst circumstances.
speak;{unit}; Yeah, well, come on.{w} Kate said to get you out here to help kill all the demons!
speak;Carlos; Of course!{w} Just keep Kate away from me and my lance is as good as yours!{w} It's the demon killing hour!
